projects.title: EasyShop Itemstore
projects.description: This project was created using  ReactJs and the Redux toolkit with data sourced from a graphQl backend endpoint via Apolloclient.  Users can view products and their details, toogle  currency options and proceed to checkout. The checkout page will be available soon.

projects.title: Thrive Ecommerce Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Created and designed using ReactJS, TailwindCSS and Context API for state data management, this project utilises available dummy data to illustrate a typical e-commerce admin dashboard. Features include dynamically rendering a side navigation, rendering components such as an order page,  charts, calendar, color picker, text editor; color mode selection etc.

projects.title: Scrumlife Scrumboard App
projects.description: Built with React and React BeautifulDND, Context API  for state data management, this project provides a means of applying scrum locally in managing tasks. It currently uses the user's local storage for storing data. With a sign-in and sign-up form managed by React Hook Form to validate a user. Common operations include create, read and delete.

projects.title: PartyTyme Cocktails
projects.description: This project utilises ReactJS, Context API for state data management and cocktail information sourced from https://www.thecocktaildb.com to present a beautiful, informative cocktail recipe site. Users can search for cocktails recipe by typing the cocktail name or (if they have forgotten it,) search by letter.
